column1: Little Goat Diner////Glad I had a reservation. Got the korean burger
column2: shared fries with a friend and we split the Choco Taco dessert (which
column3: isn't actually a taco). Everything was very good
column4: the korean burger was big and tasty but the kimchi wasn't my cup of tea. Fries were plentiful (as they should be) and the choco taco was good
column5: but hard to eat and not omg-amazing like other yelpers claim. Glad I checked this place out it was adorable and had some really interesting looking plates.
